alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Davidson; Dickson; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 6:52AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Davidson, southeastern Dickson, north central Maury, western Williamson, southeastern Cheatham and northeastern Hickman Counties through 730 AM CST... At 652 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near White Bluff to near Centerville. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Dickson, Ashland City, Centerville, Nashville, Madison, Hendersonville, Brentwood, Goodlettsville, Forest Hills, Oak Hill, White Bluff, Belle Meade, Kingston Springs, Lakewood, Thompson`s Station, Pegram, Burns, Fairview and Bellevue. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 167 and 214. Interstate 65 between mile markers 71 and 95. Interstate 24 between mile markers 40 and 53. Interstate 840 between mile markers 1 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
